passages.text:
Welcome to our fantasy role playing adventure. Hopefully you will like the story that we have in store for you.

[[Next->begin]]
passages.name: Welcome!

passages.text:
You are standing in a field. To the south is a small house. To the north is a path leading to a forest.

[[South->porch]]

[[North->forest entry]]
passages.name: begin

passages.text:
You are standing on the front porch of your house. It's been a long day and you are looking forward to getting some well-deserved rest. Good night.

THE END
passages.name: porch

passages.text:
You are standing at the edge of a large forest. A path leads into the darkness and you can see nothing more than this.

[[Next->forest monsters]]
passages.name: forest entry

passages.text:
You won!

THE END

[[Try again?->Welcome!]]
[[Something new->testbed]]
passages.name: win

passages.text:
I wanted to try something new to show the use of more links.

[[First Option->first]]
[[Second Option->second]]
[[Third Option->third]]
[[Fourth Option->fourth]]
[[Fifth Option->fifth]]
[[Sixth Option->sixth]]
passages.name: testbed

passages.text:
This was the first option. It seems to work.

THE END
passages.name: first

passages.text:
This was the x option. It seems to work.

THE END
passages.name: second

passages.text:
This was the 3rd option. It seems to work.

THE END
passages.name: third

passages.text:
This was the nth option. It seems to work.

THE END
